game.name: Last Group Out
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Team up, gear up, and make it out alive in this 2D co-op extraction shooter.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Team up, gear up, and make it out alive in this 2D co-op extraction shooter.

reviewHighlights.text: In regard to the game itself: If you enjoy playing an isometric perspective and enjoy gameplay based around scavenging, exploration, and weapon custom...
The game has potential, but the bar for entry is annoyingly high. First: don't bother with this game if you're a single player, this game is tailor-ma...
